You find yourself enveloped in the tranquil embrace of the Echoing Bastion, a sanctuary carved from the very heart of the Shattered Corridor. Shadows weave through the space, dancing alongside the glimmering quartz embedded in the stone walls, casting an otherworldly glow that flickers like stars in a twilight sky. The air is thick with anticipation, a blend of hope and anxiety that clings to your skin as you take a moment to gather your thoughts before venturing onward into the unknown.
